nodes.text: Nigiro was a BFF-1 bulk freighter that transferred munitions to the Dellalt system, preparing the Operation Strike Fear. It was destroyed by Keyan Farlander and Hamo Blastwell during the defection of Bixby.
The name is an anagram of Origin, the company that brought "Wing Commander" game, from which Star Wars: X-Wing was more or less inspired.
